entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 60S LATE
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY

MOSTLY SUNNY
